---
title: "asf prldm heterotypic analysis"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(here)

source(here("scripts", "roundTwo", "main.R"))
```

```{r}
heterotypic <- process_data("030_158")
```

```{r}
heterotypic %>% 
      filter(monomer_type == "asm") %>%
      filter(!monomer_conc == 0 && !fibril_conc == 0) %>%
      
      ggplot(aes(x = hours / 3600, y = value, group = id,
           color = reaction)) +
      geom_point() +
      geom_line() +
      labs(title = "raw asm rxns of 030_156 A",
           subtitle = "[figure 1a]")
```
